benchmark_details.name: ND400
benchmark_details.overview: ND400 is a benchmark dataset created by sampling 200 image-text pairs from NoCaps and 200 image-text pairs from DOCCI, used to evaluate semantic drift in unified models by providing diverse and fine-grained visual details.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To quantify how unified models preserve semantics over repeated modality shifts by evaluating semantic drift in generative tasks.

data.source: Sampling from NoCaps and DOCCI datasets.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated by measuring semantic similarity at each generation step between the original input and subsequent outputs.
methodology.interpretation: A higher Mean Cumulative Drift indicates better retention of semantic meaning across generations.
methodology.validation: Experiments conducted across multiple models to highlight variation in performance.
